sources.title: Summer Of Fear( 1978)
sources.description: A teenage girl's life is turned upside down after her cousin moves into her house, and as time goes by, she begins to suspect that she may be a practitioner of witchcraft.

metadata.Plot: A country family of five takes in cousin Julia, whose parents recently perished in a car crash. Julia extends her influence over the family and those around them, fooling all except for Rachel, the teenaged girl who knows her cousin is up to no good.
metadata.Writer: Lois Duncan, Glenn M. Benest, Max A. Keller
metadata.Actors: Linda Blair, Lee Purcell, Jeremy Slate
